mapper.select: INSERT INTO History(id, orderId, stage, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{id}, #{orderId}, #{stage}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
SELECT Count(*) FROM History WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM `Order` WHERE groupId = #{groupId}) AND stage = "ORDER_CONFIRM";
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM History WHERE History.orderId = #{orderId}) as p ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC LIMIT 1;
